actions.name: Rotting Touch
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +2 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. _Hit:_ 5 (2d4) necrotic damage.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While the violet fungus remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary fungus.

special_abilities.name: Plant Resilience
special_abilities.desc: The violet fungus is resistant to exhaustion and to the paralyzed, petrified, and unconscious conditions.
